message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000.  It's a great deal for you, considering its value to you is $12,000. Let me know what you think!
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I'm looking to pay closer to $8,500.  It's a fair price considering the value to me and your asking price.  Let's see if we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $8,500 is a little low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $9,250.  That's still a great price for you, considering the value of the product to you. Let's see if we can make this work!
